Repository Name Unauthorized: Athens Municipal Library Special Heritage And Genealogical Collection
Notes: Some of the materials available: Submitted scrapbooks, Submitted family histories, Local history, Local pictures, School information-Athens & rural County histories, Obituaries 1871-1897, Military information, Athens area original tax books, Athens High School year books, Cemetery readings & records, Menard Co., IL. marriages 1839-1931, Menard Co., IL. births & deaths 1877-1900, Menard Co., IL. census 1850-1880 & 1910, Menard Co., IL. Almshouse 1879-1940, Private Mott Funeral Home Records 1845-1895-unpublished, Abraham Lincoln book collection and much, much, more.
Source of Repository Data: Illinois State Historical Records Advisory Board
